title: Gov. Hickenlooper orders flags lowered for Major General John L. France (The Office of the ...
text: ( Source : The Office of the Governor of the State of Colorado ) DENVER - Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 - Gov. John Hickenlooper today ordered flags be lowered to half-staff on Monday, Oct. 26, on all public buildings statewide in memory of Maj. Gen.
